field.name: summary
field.value: AjaxAction proxy generating fails with JSONBinder

field.name: description
field.value:
PrototypeAjaxProxyGenerator throws a NullReferenceException when a AjaxAction controller method parameter is bound with JSonBinder. From what I can see in the source, JSONBinderAttribute class no longer has a public EntryKey property, and PrototypeAjaxProxyGenerator.cs is looking explicitly for that in line 174, which causes the problem. the fix should be to resurrect the public EntryKey property in JSonBinder.
[NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.] Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Services.AjaxProxyGenerator.PrototypeAjaxProxyGenerator.GetPropertyValue(Object obj, String propName) in c:\ccnet\CastleWorkDir\WorkingDirectory\MonoRail\Castle.MonoRail.Framework\Services\AjaxProxyGenerator\PrototypeAjaxProxyGenerator.cs:260 Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Services.AjaxProxyGenerator.PrototypeAjaxProxyGenerator.GenerateJSProxy(IEngineContext context, String proxyName, String area, String controller) in c:\ccnet\CastleWorkDir\WorkingDirectory\MonoRail\Castle.MonoRail.Framework\Services\AjaxProxyGenerator\PrototypeAjaxProxyGenerator.cs:174 Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Helpers.AjaxHelper.GenerateJSProxy(String proxyName, String area, String controller) in c:\ccnet\CastleWorkDir\WorkingDirectory\MonoRail\Castle.MonoRail.Framework\Helpers\AjaxHelper.cs:159 Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Helpers.AjaxHelper.GenerateJSProxy(String proxyName) in c:\ccnet\CastleWorkDir\WorkingDirectory\MonoRail\Castle.MonoRail.Framework\Helpers\AjaxHelper.cs:138
